rooms.name: Living Area
rooms.description: Large open-plan living area with a modern decor featuring minimalistic furniture and natural light from large glass windows. The space is oriented to face the south-east direction per Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living area for social gatherings, ensuring proper flow with open spaces and well-lit environment.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen designed with smart storage solutions and appliances; located in the north-west region of the house as per Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Private bedroom for the primary residents, positioned towards the south direction to enhance positive energy. Includes an ensuite bathroom for privacy.
